item.title: Ansible playbooks
item.description: Ansible is a task execution engine. It exists to provide a method for operators, engineers, developers or whomever, to easily define one or more actions to be performed on one or more computers. This capability represents a step beyond simply just logging into each computer in question, and manually typing out the command. These tasks can target the local system Ansible is running from, as well as other systems Ansible can reach over the network.
